languages.text: Поле боя скорее похоже на бойню — защитников дворца застали врасплох и буквально забили.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Вы видите бойню, судя по всему гвардейцев защищавших дворец застали врасполох

languages.text: The battlefield looks more like a bloodbath — the defenders of the palace were taken by surprise and literally slaughtered.
languages.original_text: Поле боя скорее похоже на бойню — защитников дворца застали врасплох и буквально забили.

traits.locale_text: The battlefield looks more like a bloodbath — the defenders of the palace were taken by surprise and literally slaughtered.
The battlefield looks more like a bloodbath — the defenders of the palace were taken by surprise and literally slaughtered.
The battlefield looks more like a bloodbath — the defenders of the palace were taken by surprise and literally slaughtered.
The battlefield looks more like a bloodbath — the defenders of the palace were taken by surprise and literally slaughtered.
The battlefield looks more like a bloodbath — the defenders of the palace were taken by surprise and literally slaughtered.

languages.text: 这里不像是战场，更像是屠宰场。宫殿的守卫被打了个措手不及，几乎是遭到了单方面屠杀。
languages.original_text: The battlefield looks more like a bloodbath — the defenders of the palace were taken by surprise and literally slaughtered.

traits.locale_text: 这里不像是战场，更像是屠宰场。宫殿的守卫被打了个措手不及，几乎是遭到了单方面屠杀。

languages.text: Esto no es un campo de batalla sino una carnicería. Los defensores del palacio fueron sorprendidos y la matanza es literal.
languages.original_text: The battlefield looks more like a bloodbath — the defenders of the palace were taken by surprise and literally slaughtered.

traits.locale_text: Esto no es un campo de batalla sino una carnicería. Los defensores del palacio fueron sorprendidos y la matanza es literal.

languages.text: 戦場は一方的な大虐殺だったようだ――宮殿の番人達は不意を突かれて、大袈裟ではなく虐殺されてしまっている。
languages.original_text: The battlefield looks more like a bloodbath — the defenders of the palace were taken by surprise and literally slaughtered.

traits.locale_text: 戦場は一方的な大虐殺だったようだ――宮殿の番人達は不意を突かれて、大袈裟ではなく虐殺されてしまっている。

languages.text: Das Schlachtfeld sieht eher nach einem Blutbad aus – die Verteidiger des Palasts wurden überrascht und buchstäblich dahingemetzelt.
languages.original_text: The battlefield looks more like a bloodbath — the defenders of the palace were taken by surprise and literally slaughtered.

traits.locale_text: Das Schlachtfeld sieht eher nach einem Blutbad aus – die Verteidiger des Palasts wurden überrascht und buchstäblich dahingemetzelt.

languages.text: Le champ de bataille est un véritable bain de sang : les gardes du palais ont été pris par surprise et se sont fait massacrer.
languages.original_text: The battlefield looks more like a bloodbath — the defenders of the palace were taken by surprise and literally slaughtered.

traits.locale_text: Le champ de bataille est un véritable bain de sang : les gardes du palais ont été pris par surprise et se sont fait massacrer.

languages.text: Savaş alanı, kan gölünü andırıyor. Sarayı savunanlar sürpriz bir saldırı altında kalmış ve kelimenin tam anlamıyla parçalanmışlar.
languages.original_text: The battlefield looks more like a bloodbath — the defenders of the palace were taken by surprise and literally slaughtered.

traits.locale_text: Savaş alanı, kan gölünü andırıyor. Sarayı savunanlar sürpriz bir saldırı altında kalmış ve kelimenin tam anlamıyla parçalanmışlar.
